{{Description|Offer the Dendro Sigils you collect on your adventures to the Tree of Dreams in Vanarana, and obtain the favor of the forest for yourself}}
'''Vanarana's Favor''' is an [[Offering System]] that is leveled with [[Dendro Sigil]]s. It can be found at the [[Tree of Dreams]] in [[Vanarana]], [[Sumeru]].

Vanarana's Favor is unlocked by completing the quest [[Trees and Dreams]] after the {{Quest|The World of Aranara}}.

In [[Version 3.4]], the maximum level is limited to 40 despite the possibility of obtaining more than enough Dendro Sigils. The game prevents players from offering more by displaying the following error: "Max level reached for the current version."

==Tutorial==
{{Tutorial
|image1 = Tutorial Tree of Dreams, Vanarana.png
|text1  = You can obtain Dendro Sigils in your adventures throughout Sumeru. Offer them up to the Tree of Dreams deep within Vanarana to level it up and obtain precious materials.
}}

==Rewards==
Raising the Tree of Dreams' level requires {{Item|Dendro Sigil}} offered in groups of 35.<!-- A total of 1750 [[Dendro Sigil]]s are required to reach the maximum level.-->

All levels* will reward: {{Card|Adventure EXP|200|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mystic Enhancement Ore|10|show_caption=1}}{{Card|Mora|50,000|show_caption=1}}

<nowiki>*</nowiki>Level 40 rewards a [[Dream Solvent]] instead of Adventure EXP.
